products.name: Pro WS TRX50-SAGE WIFI
products.description: AMD TR5 CEB workstation motherboard, CPU and memory overclocking ready, robust 36 power-stage design, PCIe 5.0 x 16, M.2, 10 Gb and 2.5 Gb LAN, multi-GPU support, ASUS Control Center Express

products.name: Pro WS WRX80E-SAGE SE WIFI
products.description: AMD WRX80 Ryzen™ Threadripper™ PRO extended-ATX workstation motherboard, Intel dual 10 G LAN, USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port, 3 x M.2 PCIe 4.0, ASMB9-iKVM

products.name: Pro WS X570-ACE
products.description: AMD AM4 X570 ATX 워크스테이션 메인보드 : 3개의 PCIe 4.0 x16 , IR3555과 14페이즈 전원부, DDR ECC 메모리, Intel Gigabit LAN, Dual M.2, U.2 및 ASUS Control Center Express
